type.description:
### ‚ö†Ô∏è Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ‚ö†Ô∏è

## Player Model Type

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/player_model_type).

A power type that sets a player's model type.

Type ID: `apugli:player_model_type`



---

### üìù Note

This power will not update the player's texture, so you may be left with transparent pixels as a result of this.



---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:player_model_type",
    "model": "slim"
}
```
This example sets a `PlayerEntity`'s model type to the `slim` model type.

[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/player_model_type).

A power type that sets a player's model type.

Type ID: `apugli:player_model_type`



---

### üìù Note

This power will not update the player's texture, so you may be left with transparent pixels as a result of this.



---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:player_model_type",
    "model": "slim"
```

This example sets a `PlayerEntity`'s model type to the `slim` model type.

model.description: The player model to associate with a player entity. One of `default` or `slim`.
model.markdownDescription: The player model to associate with a player entity. One of `default` or `slim`.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Player Model Type (Power Type) date: 2022-12-29

Player Model Type

Power Type.

A power type that sets a player's model type.

Type ID: apugli:player_model_type

!!! note

This power will not update the player's texture, so you may be left with transparent pixels as a result of this.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
model String The player model to associate with a player entity. One of default or slim.

Example

{
    "type": "apugli:player_model_type",
    "model": "slim"
}

This example sets a PlayerEntity's model type to the slim model type.
